SEARCH
Package pl.put.poznan.buildinginfo.rest

Class BuildingInfoController

java.lang.Object
pl.put.poznan.buildinginfo.rest.BuildingInfoController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/BuildingInfoService") public class BuildingInfoController extends Object
This class serves as the application's rest controller. It intercepts the relevant http requests and calls the corresponding methods.

  • Method Details

    • createBuilding

      @RequestMapping(value="", method=POST) public String createBuilding(@RequestBody String json)
      This method responds to a POST request. Creates a building composite using a BuildingManager object.
      Parameters:
      json - This is a building structure in json format.
      Returns:
      This method returns a message depending on the composite build operation.

    • getBuildingStructure

      @RequestMapping(value="", method=GET) public String getBuildingStructure()
      This method responds to a GET request. Using an object of the BuildingManager class, it returns the structure of the building in json format.
      Returns:
      json with the building structure, or an operation failure message.

    • getBuildingInfo

      @RequestMapping(value="/{option}", method=GET) public String getBuildingInfo(@PathVariable String option)
      This method responds to a GET request. Using an object of the BuildingManager class, it returns relevant information about the building.
      Parameters:
      option - This parameter defines what information about the building is to be retrieved and returned. This parameter takes the following values: all, area, cube, heating, light, lps, hpc.
      Returns:
      This method returns information about the building in the form of a string whose structure corresponds to the json format if the operation is successful. If the operation fails, the method returns an appropriate message.

    • getFloorsInfo

      @RequestMapping(value="/floors/{option}", method=GET) public String getFloorsInfo(@PathVariable String option)
      This method responds to a GET request. Using an object of the BuildingManager class, it returns relevant information about all floors in building.
      Parameters:
      option - This parameter defines what information about the floors is to be retrieved and returned. This parameter takes the following values: all, area, cube, heating, light, lps, hpc.
      Returns:
      This method returns information about all floors in building in the form of a string whose structure corresponds to the json format if the operation is successful. If the operation fails, the method returns an appropriate message.

    • getFloorInfo

      @RequestMapping(value="/floors/{floor_name}/{option}", method=GET) public String getFloorInfo(@PathVariable("floor_name") String floor_name, @PathVariable("option") String option)
      This method responds to a GET request. Using an object of the BuildingManager class, it returns relevant information about specific floor in building.
      Parameters:
      floor_name - This parameter defines which floor we want to obtain information about. This parameter takes the floor name.
      option - This parameter defines what information about the floor is to be retrieved and returned. This parameter takes the following values: all, area, cube, heating, light, lps, hpc.
      Returns:
      This method returns information about specific floor in building in the form of a string whose structure corresponds to the json format if the operation is successful. If the operation fails, the method returns an appropriate message.

    • getRoomsInfo

      @RequestMapping(value="/rooms/{option}", method=GET) public String getRoomsInfo(@PathVariable("option") String option)
      This method responds to a GET request. Using an object of the BuildingManager class, it returns relevant information about all rooms in building.
      Parameters:
      option - This parameter defines what information about the rooms is to be retrieved and returned. This parameter takes the following values: all, area, cube, heating, light, lps, hpc.
      Returns:
      This method returns information about all rooms in building in the form of a string whose structure corresponds to the json format if the operation is successful. If the operation fails, the method returns an appropriate message.

    • getRoomInfo

      @RequestMapping(value="/rooms/{room_name}/{option}", method=GET) public String getRoomInfo(@PathVariable("room_name") String room_name, @PathVariable("option") String option)
      This method responds to a GET request. Using an object of the BuildingManager class, it returns relevant information about specific room in building.
      Parameters:
      room_name - This parameter defines which room we want to obtain information about. This parameter takes the room name.
      option - This parameter defines what information about the room is to be retrieved and returned. This parameter takes the following values: all, area, cube, heating, light, lps, hpc.
      Returns:
      This method returns information about specific room in building in the form of a string whose structure corresponds to the json format if the operation is successful. If the operation fails, the method returns an appropriate message.

    • getRoomsUnderLitghtLimit

      @RequestMapping(value="/rooms/lightLimit", method=GET) public String getRoomsUnderLitghtLimit()

    • getRoomsOverHeatLimit

      @RequestMapping(value="/rooms/heatLimit", method=GET) public String getRoomsOverHeatLimit()
